Our Process

Contact Us

Start planning your event and get in touch with us by filling in our online form, so that we can discuss all the details of your event or party.

Design

We then contact you to discuss your vision further, and create a digital mockup of your event using the images you provided to us.

Pay

We will then send you a final quote and invoice to finalise your order. You can pay online or over the phone using a credit or debit card.

Deliver

If you have chosen delivery and installation, we will schedule a date that works for you and install everything, bringing you vision to life.

ABOUT US

Dream Events are an Eco Friendly balloon company, based in Swansea. We pride ourselves in transforming venues for your special event. We design and create small and large displays, as well as beautiful organic designs. Dream Events are proud to be a sustainable events company, by only using biodegradable or re-usable products.
